nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member sedimentFluxIndex is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Time stamp for frequency of computation of the sedimentFluxIndex analysis member.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the sedimentFluxIndex analysis member should be tied to

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_directory
nml_option.description: subdirectory to write text files (might useful)

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentFluxIndex_use_lat_lon_coords
nml_option.description: If true, latitude/longitude coordinates are output for eddy census. Otherwise x/y/z coordinates are used. Ignored if not on a sphere.

package.name: sedimentFluxIndexAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the sediment flux index analysis member.

var.name: sedimentFluxIndexVAX
var.description: Index of Vertically-Averaged sediment flux in X-direction

var.name: sedimentFluxIndexVAY
var.description: Index of Vertically-Averaged sediment flux in Y-direction

var.name: sedimentFluxIndexBX
var.description: Index of Bottom sediment flux in X-direction

var.name: sedimentFluxIndexBY
var.description: Index of Bottom sediment flux in Y-direction
